The National Review of Sciences for Students

A review by and for students

Join our team

Become part of The National Review of Sciences for Students. Contribute with your talent to scientific dissemination and support students in their path to research. Select a role to learn about its functions or apply to the available positions.

Founder

Cargo definido

Person who started the project, defining its vision and initial objectives. Oversees the strategic direction of the review.

Co-Founder

Cargo definido

Key collaborator in the foundation of the project, supports the Founder in strategic decision-making.

General Director

Cargo definido

In charge of the overall vision, team coordination, external relations, and overall supervision of the review.

Deputy General Director

Cargo definido

Assists the General Director in strategic decisions and assumes direction in their absence.

Editor in Chief

Cargo postulable

Oversees all contents and coordinates the editorial team. Ensures the quality of the articles.

Postular

Section Editor

Cargo postulable

Reviews and edits texts from a specific section (e.g., Opinion, Culture, Current Affairs). Votes to publish or not a work.

Postular

Reviewer / Editorial Committee

Cargo postulable

Corrects style, spelling, and coherence of the articles. Provides feedback to the authors.

Postular

Web Development Manager

Cargo definido

Manages the website, corrects technical errors, and implements design and functionality improvements.

Technical Support Manager

Cargo postulable

Resolves technical problems related to content loading, forms, and emails.

Postular

Social Media Manager

Cargo definido

Manages social networks (Instagram, X, TikTok, etc.), publishes content, and promotes the review.

Graphic Designer

Cargo postulable

Creates visual material such as posters, covers, and templates for social networks.

Postular

Community Manager

Cargo postulable

Interacts with the community, responds to messages, and encourages participation in the review's platforms.

Postular

Article Reception Manager

Cargo postulable

Receives, organizes, and channels article applications to the reviewers.

Postular

New Collaborators Manager

Cargo postulable

Guides new applicants to administrative roles, reviewers, or editors.

Postular

Events or Calls Coordinator

Cargo postulable

Organizes talks, debates, contests, or other activities to promote the review.

Postular

Legal/Editorial Advisor

Cargo postulable

Reviews legal terms, editorial standards, and copyright for the review (NOT NECESSARY AT THE MOMENT).

Postular

Finance / Transparency Manager

Cargo postulable

Manages donations or budgets, ensuring transparency in finances (NOT NECESSARY AT THE MOMENT).

Postular
